attributes.title: If I could give less than 1 star..I would
attributes.review: This app seemed pretty promising to begin with, but upon further use it quickly became the absolute worst app I have ever used in my whole entire life!!! Even flappy bird didn’t make me as angry as this app. -100000000/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Hacked
attributes.review: This app made my dog eat my ass. Worst app ever.

attributes.title: STAY AWAY
attributes.review: this app gave my phone a VIRUS. HORRIBLE, TERRIBLE, NEVER.EVER. RECOMMEND

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!                      😼tiktok😼
attributes.review: this app was so BAD!! it took weeks to download.when it finally downloaded i starred to ✨zone out✨from the bright screen after turning my brightness ALL THE WAY DOWN! this was so unacceptable. this app is very very bad. DONT DOWNLOAD IT! 😻bunker boy😻 is trying to get rid of tiktok,but guess what you can’t get rid of us😝.were staying and if not we’ll find a different app🦈 this app was highly overrated and i suggest no one gets it! don’t get the app! it’s very bad and caused me to zone out multiple times due to how bright the screen was! it also took WEEKS to download.
i don’t even have anything clever to say except this app ~sucks~😌✨ and did nothing but plague and destroy my phone after finally downloading

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review:
Man} Once upon a time there was a lovely princess.

But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort which could only 

be broken by love's first kiss.

She was locked away in a castle guarded by a terrible fire-breathing 

dragon.

Many brave knigts had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison, 

but non prevailed.

She waited in the dragon's keep in the highest room of the tallest 

tower for her true love and true love's first kiss.

{Laughing} 

Like that's ever gonna happen.

{Paper Rusting, Toilet Flushes}

What a load of - 

Somebody once told me the world is gonna roll me

I ain't the sharpest tool in the shed

She was lookin' kind of dumb with her finger and her thumb

In the shape of an "L" on her forehead

The years start comin' and they don't stop comin'

Fed to the rules and hit the ground runnin'

Didn't make sense not to live for fun

Your brain gets smart but your head gets dumb

So much to do so much to see

So what's wrong with takin' the backstreets

You'll never know if you don't go

You'll never shine if you don't glow

Hey, now You're an all-star

Get your game on, go play

Hey, now You're a rock star

Get the show on, get paid

And all that glitters is gold

Only shootin' stars break the mold

It's a cool place and they say it gets colder

You're bundled up now but wait till you get older

But the meteor men beg to differ

Judging by the hole in the satellite picture

The ice we skate is gettin' pretty thin

The water's getting warm so you might as well swim

My world's on fire

How 'bout yours

That's the way I like it and I'll never get bored

Hey, now, you're an all-star

{Shouting}

Get your game on, go play

Hey, now You're a rock star

Get the show on, get paid

And all that glitters is gold

Only shootin' stars break the mold

{Belches}

Go!

Go!

{Record Scratching}

Go. Go.Go.

Hey, now, you're an all-star

Get your game on, go play

Hey, now You're a rock star

Get the show on, get paid

And all that glitters is gold

Only shootin' stars break the mold

-Think it's in there?

-All right. Let's get it!

-Whoa. Hold on. Do you know what that thing can do to you?

-Yeah, it'll grind your bones for it's bread.

{Laughs}

-Yes, well, actually, that would be a gaint.

Now, ogres - - They're much worse.

They'll make a suit from your freshly peeled skin.

-No!

-They'll shave your liver. Squeeze the jelly from your eyes!

Actually, it's quite good on toast.

attributes.title: this is ✨traumatizing✨
attributes.review: since all the white trump supporters are getting this app i decided to try it out😼worst decision of my life, and has impacted my life in a horrific way.✨surprisingly, i was extremely excited to get this app and see what it’s like to 𝑐𝑜𝑢𝑔ℎ 𝑐𝑜𝑢𝑔ℎ support 𝑐𝑜𝑢𝑔ℎ our ✨orange✨president until it took forever to download.😍a DAY. once it downloaded, it kept spamming me with notifications and i haven’t even opened the app yet. once i opened it it was fairly normal until about an hour of using it a death threat came up for joe biden🙊 me, being the terrified little girl i am, i clicked off of it suddenly the ✨𝑜𝑟𝑎𝑛𝑔𝑒𝑠 𝑛𝑢𝑑𝑒𝑠✨popped up. i clicked off IMMEDIATELY at this point my eyes were bleeding and i will need therapy.❤️🤠😹🥰✌️😌 very expensive therapy. i cry myself to sleep every night now. i just saw a oranges no no square😔a my eyes will probably never stop bleeding from these traumatic experiences i’ve had with this app.anyways, i kept on using it because why not🤠yee yee🤠it started glitching and i got scared. once again, something popped up. thankfully it was not the ✨no no square✨ but it was a video of obama being held captive🙀then the ✨orange✨ came out and started speaking very aggressive spanish. right in front of me on my phone screen was a live video of obama being held captive by the orange! i kept watching, just to find out joe biden was captured to. that didn’t really surprise me much. but what comes next is very surprising🙊 addison rae was being held captive too?! everyone was wonder were she has been but who would’ve guessed the orange has been holding her captive! while the orange is still aggressively yelling spanish, i clicked off finally. i immediately deleted the app. no matter how hard i try, i will unfortunately, never forget. (please pray for my eyes.) they will never be the same. r.i.p💀 i 100% do not recommend✌️🤠 only if you want to  see what i saw today✨😹 yeah❤️
